name: 5 Min Game
description:
Hey guys, this is my first game after a couple months of development.  

If you are bored in your house and looking for a quick and simple game, this is the perfect solution! That's is why it's called 5 Min Game, because it shouldn't take you more than 5 minutes to finished it. Give it a try!

Your goal is to eliminate all enemies from the area.

Controls:

Space to shoot(be mindful of your ammo)

KeyStrokes or W,A,S,D to move

Reminders:

I will not continue with this game much further, maximum 2 updates, because as the name says, 5 Min Game, if I keep adding products it will loose the sense of 5 minutes, instead I will probably make different games.
